title: RILRADIOSTATEITEMFLAG (ntddrilapitypes.h)
description: Microsoft reserves the RILRADIOSTATEITEMFLAG enumeration for internal use only. Don't use the RILRADIOSTATEITEMFLAG enumeration in your code.
